              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              Requirements:
              
              + Minimum 3 years’experience in quality inspection of the Outdoor and Indoor furniture.
              
              + Familiar with photo taking and camera operation
              
              + Familiar with making daily, weekly quality control reports, final inspection reports and following production process
              
              + Good at MS Word, MS Excel
              
              + Knowledge in Outdoor / Indoor furniture production
              
              + Knowledge and experience in wood, iron, wicker, packing, container loading
              
              + Physically strong
              
              + Active, trustworthy and honest
              
              + Strong in communication  and interpersonal skills
              
              + Minimum English level A
              

              Request:
              
              + CV in English and Vietnamese with photo
              
              + Application Letter.
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
